item.description: ğŸ¹ Cocktail Pi Cocktails based on your mood created by a Raspberry Pi bartender. Drinks are selected based on your emotion and multilingual voice prompts let you know when your drink is available. How to build a fully automated home build cocktail maker. Code available at **https://github.com/saubury/cocktail-pi**ğŸ¸ Pumps I used 4 peristaltic pumps to provide a â€œfood safeâ€ way to pump the liquids from the drink bottles. These pumps provide a steady rate of flow of liquids when powered.
